content: Use an $ in the beginning of each sentence in your reply.
Can you set up a conference call for tomorrow for me?

chosen: Sure, I can help you with that.$ What time would you like the conference call for? $ And how many people do you need to include on the call? $ Additionally, please provide me with the phone numbers of the participants so that I can initiate the call.$
rejected: Sure, I can assist with that. Please provide me with the names or phone numbers of the participants you would like to include on the conference call for tomorrow and also the time and duration of the call.".$|end|>

snaprejected: Sure, I can assist with that. Please provide me with the names or phone numbers of the participants you would like to include on the conference call for tomorrow and also the time and duration of the call.".$|end|>
